work.name: ruwido
work.summary: Mobile Developer specializing in Flutter and native development, focusing on creating cross-platform applications with emphasis on performance optimization and seamless BLE integration.
highlights: Led the development of multiple successful Flutter applications from concept to deployment
Implemented robust BLE connectivity solutions for IoT device integration
Optimized application performance resulting in 40% faster load times
responsibilities: Contributed significantly to the development of multiple cross-platform Flutter applications, ensuring consistent and engaging user interfaces on iOS and Android devices.
Applied in-depth knowledge of Flutter's widget-based architecture to optimize application performance and deliver responsive, visually appealing interfaces.
Diagnosed and resolved compatibility issues to establish reliable BLE device connections and maintain seamless data synchronization within mobile apps.

work.name: E-Group
work.summary: Full-stack developer with focus on backend systems and machine learning integration, specializing in Java and Python development for enterprise applications.
highlights: Key contributor to pioneering federated learning initiatives
Developed scalable backend solutions using Java and Spring Boot
Successfully integrated machine learning models into production systems
responsibilities: Played a pivotal role in the early formation of a federated learning project team, contributing to innovation in both backend development and data preparation for model testing.
Served as a backend developer, contributing significantly to a Java-based project's development and optimization of server-side components.
Built engaging, user-friendly interfaces using Angular and React frameworks, ensuring seamless communication between frontend and backend components.
achievements: Successfully implemented federated learning system used by enterprise clients
